items.name: init
items.title: BuzzForm
items.description: Core BuzzForm components including Form, FormFields, FormSubmit, FormReset, and field rendering system. Requires setting up a provider - see documentation.

items.name: copy
items.title: CopyButton
items.description: A copy-to-clipboard button component used by BuzzForm fields with the copyable option.

items.name: text
items.title: TextField
items.description: A text input field component for BuzzForm. Supports validation, copy-to-clipboard, and all TextField options.

items.name: textarea
items.title: TextareaField
items.description: A multi-line textarea field component for BuzzForm. Supports auto-resize, character count, copy-to-clipboard, and all TextareaField options.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: CheckboxField
items.description: A checkbox field component for BuzzForm. Supports boolean values with horizontal label layout.

items.name: password
items.title: PasswordField
items.description: A password field component for BuzzForm. Supports show/hide toggle, strength indicator, requirements checklist, password generation, and copy-to-clipboard.

items.name: switch
items.title: SwitchField
items.description: A toggle switch field component for BuzzForm. Supports boolean values with horizontal label layout, similar to checkbox but with a switch UI.

items.name: radio
items.title: RadioField
items.description: A radio group field component for BuzzForm. Supports single selection with default or card variants, horizontal/vertical direction, and multi-column grid layouts.

items.name: number
items.title: NumberField
items.description: A number input field component for BuzzForm. Supports stepper variants (default, stacked, pill, plain), prefix/suffix, thousand separators, precision, and min/max constraints.

items.name: tags
items.title: TagsField
items.description: A chip-based multi-value tag input field for BuzzForm. Supports customizable delimiters (enter, comma, space, tab), variants (chips, pills, inline), min/max tags, duplicate handling, and copy-to-clipboard.

items.name: date
items.title: DateField
items.description: A date and datetime field components for BuzzForm. Supports date and datetime selection, customizable formats (date-fns display), manual input parsing with inputFormat, and time picker options.

items.name: select
items.title: SelectField
items.description: A select dropdown field component for BuzzForm. Supports single and multi-select (hasMany), static or async options, dependent dropdowns (dependencies), searchable, clearable, and custom option rendering with icons and descriptions.

items.name: upload
items.title: UploadField
items.description: A file upload field component for BuzzForm. Supports single and multiple file uploads (hasMany), drag-and-drop, variants (dropzone, avatar, inline, gallery), progress indicators, and file previews with size validation.

items.name: row
items.title: RowField
items.description: A horizontal layout field for BuzzForm. Organizes fields side-by-side with customizable gap, alignment (start, center, end, stretch), justify (start, center, end, between), wrapping, and responsive behavior (stacks on mobile by default).

items.name: group
items.title: GroupField
items.description: A container field for BuzzForm that groups nested fields into named objects. Supports multiple visual variants (card, flat, ghost, bordered) with collapse/expand functionality, error badge display, and nested field validation.
